testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: I love how easily I could change the background for my YouTube videos. The process was smooth and the results were amazing!

items.name: David Smith
items.comment: This tool has revolutionized my video editing workflow. I can create stunning videos faster than ever before.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common inquiries about our AI Background Changer for Video

items.title: What types of videos can I edit with WaveSpeed?
items.description: You can edit a variety of videos, including social media clips, promotional materials, and personal projects. The AI effectively handles different backgrounds and subject types.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the AI Background Changer?
items.description: Yes! Users receive 30 free credits daily. Additional credits can be obtained through challenges and promotions. Subscription plans are available for professional needs.

items.title: Can I use my edited videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Subscribers can use their edited videos for commercial projects. Free-tier users are limited to personal use, so check our Terms for details.

items.title: How does privacy work with my videos?
items.description: All video processing occurs in your browser to ensure privacy. Your videos are not uploaded to servers and are securely edited on your device.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the difference for yourself. No sign-up required.
